doc:
Richard Barthelmess https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Barthelmess 0 Richard Semler Barthelmess (May 9, 1895 – August 17, 1963) was an American film actor, principally of the Hollywood silent era. He starred opposite Lillian Gish in D.W. Griffith's Broken Blossoms (1919) and Way Down East (1920) and was among the founders of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences in 1927. The following year, he was nominated for the Academy Award for Best Actor for two films: The Patent Leather Kid and The Noose. Richard_Semler_Barthelmess ( May_9_,_1895 – August_17_,_1963 ) was an_American_film_actor , principally of the_Hollywood_silent_era . He starred opposite_Lillian_Gish in D.W._Griffith 's_Broken_Blossoms_(_1919_)_and_Way Down East_(_1920_) and was among the_founders of the_Academy of Motion_Picture_Arts_and_Sciences in 1927 . The_following_year , he was_nominated for the_Academy_Award for_Best_Actor for two_films : The_Patent_Leather_Kid and The_Noose .
